author: Adam Wells
title: NFL Talks War Room Guidelines, Possible Time-Limit Changes for 2020 Draft
description: The  NFL  has outlined a plan for teams to operate their war room during the 2020 NFL draft as well as potential changes for the amount of time between picks...
content:
Ronald Martinez/Getty Images
The NFL has outlined a plan for teams to operate their war room during the 2020 NFL draft as well as potential changes for the amount of time between picks. 
On a conference call with reporters (h/t NFL Network's Ian Rapoport), … [+1916 chars]
